name: Flare Up
description:
In Flare Up you control a young "fireling", a fire spirit creature who needs to ensure the future of his specie. 

To achieve this goal you will need to burn different objects, in different places, to gain power from the soul-fragments (dropped from the burnt objects). With them, you will be able to unlock different abilities to help you in your mission.
